article_title: Google releases ‘most intelligent model to date,’ Gemini 2.5 Pro
summary: Google has introduced Gemini 2.5 Pro, its most intelligent model yet, aimed at enhancing AI reasoning capabilities. The model features improved performance and accuracy, multimodal input handling, and a large context window. Gemini 2.5 Pro is available for experimental use on Google's AI Studio and for Gemini Advanced users on the chat interface, with plans to expand to Vertex AI soon. The model excels in advanced reasoning benchmark tests and competes with other powerful reasoning models in the field. This release follows Google's recent launch of the Gemma 3 language model in March.
